price: Señor de los cielos, de la Tierra, y de todo cuanto existe entre ellos, el Poderoso, el Remisorio".
arabic: رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡغَفَّٰرُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā al-ʿazīzu al-ghafāru
